entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING, Wreckhouse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 p.m. NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wreckhouse 6:30 PM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
Temperature: 2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Wind: ESE 86 km/h gust 99 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing rain inland overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 in the Wreckhouse area. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High plus 3 except 8 north of Cape Ray.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of drizzle in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches developing in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 in the Wreckhouse area in the morning. High plus 3 except 8 north of Cape Ray. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of drizzle. Fog patches. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
